bibl.title: Receipt, W. G. Burford to David Burford1853 August 13

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: paid by D.Burford for D.Burford and WmG.Burford

Rec'd 13th day of August 1853 of David Burford six hundred and ten dollars and fifty cents on account of the purchase of the interest of James M. Couens interest in the purchase of the McAllister land. the foregoing is to pay over to the lawer for his interest one hundred and ten & a half dollars being a profit paid him on his purchase, and the five hundr to be and remain as a payment on the part of G. D.Burford towards the land and for Couens interest.
Note to H. Banks sale due 25 Dec. 1853 for $2.00
